channel.title: Think Twice by Goxenar x aUstin Haga
channel.description:

Goxenar x aUstin Haga - Think Twice
â€œTo open their eyes, and to turn them from darkness to light, and from the power of Satan unto God, that they may receive forgiveness of sins, and inheritance among them which are sanctified by faith that is in me.â€ â€­â€­Actsâ€¬ â€­26:18â€¬ â€­KJVâ€¬â€¬
I got two college tuitions on my wrist, you might think thatâ€™s funny but itâ€™d be like this. (Yeah) Rapping about things that you think you will miss, think twice about the ice that youâ€™ve got on your wrist, (yuh) think twice about the lies that you say with them lips. (Yuh) Think twice about the things youâ€™ve done that you know you wonâ€™t fix. (Yuh) Think twice about about the pain youâ€™ll cause if you keep going like this. (Yuh) Think twice or Iâ€™ma have to make another huge long list.
You can say words all you want. You can quote verses all you want. But itâ€™s not going to change the lives of those around you. Not even the ones who listen to this.
(Oh, is that right?) I donâ€™t know how to rap but I would do it if I could, how about you try me, I really wish you would. Man, I wouldnâ€™t even need my own crew (nope) â€˜cause real men like me only speak the truth. And I know you walk by wishing you were me, but honestly thatâ€™s just too hard to believe. So how about you choose between one of these, you post up and fight, or walk away like a G. Man every decision we make is way too hard, â€˜cause you know itâ€™ll always just get too far, so lets not risk it and just be calm, â€˜cause you know if we go at it youâ€™ll be more than gone. And I donâ€™t wanna put you out on the spot, but we both know that I carry the best OG glock. So I really suggest that you walk away, â€˜cause you know if we go at it youâ€™ll get messed up anyways.
Donâ€™t you think this is over â€˜cause Iâ€™m not done, it was always yâ€™all having all the fun. (Uh oh) But now itâ€™s my turn, so you better run, â€˜cause the words I got, arenâ€™t done, yes somebody flunked, lotta wording on my tongue gotta thank God for my lungs. Donâ€™t you worry though â€˜cause Iâ€™ll be done soon enough, when the devilâ€™s hung Iâ€™ll be done, meantime Iâ€™ma keep it up, otherwise Lucifer you better keep it shut.
How many times have you visited Church praying away the same sin? How many times have you turned on God because your patience was running to thin?

item.title: Think Twice by Goxenar x aUstin Haga
item.dc:creator: Goxenar
item.description:
Thankful to have worked with @aUstin_Haga once again. Check out this ultra fresh instrumental, you might need to read some lyrics. (uh-oh)

https://soundcloud.com/goxenar/goxenar-x-austin-haga-think

Goxenar x aUstin Haga - Think Twice

â€œTo open their eyes, and to turn them from darkness to light, and from the power of Satan unto God, that they may receive forgiveness of sins, and inheritance among them which are sanctified by faith that is in me.â€
â€­â€­Actsâ€¬ â€­26:18â€¬ â€­KJVâ€¬â€¬

I got two college tuitions on my wrist, you might think thatâ€™s funny but itâ€™d be like this. (Yeah) Rapping about things that you think you will miss, think twice about the ice that youâ€™ve got on your wrist, (yuh) think twice about the lies that you say with them lips. (Yuh) Think twice about the things youâ€™ve done that you know you wonâ€™t fix. (Yuh) Think twice about about the pain youâ€™ll cause if you keep going like this. (Yuh) Think twice or Iâ€™ma have to make another huge long list.

You can say words all you want. You can quote verses all you want. But itâ€™s not going to change the lives of those around you. Not even the ones who listen to this.

(Oh, is that right?) I donâ€™t know how to rap but I would do it if I could, how about you try me, I really wish you would. Man, I wouldnâ€™t even need my own crew (nope) â€˜cause real men like me only speak the truth. And I know you walk by wishing you were me, but honestly thatâ€™s just too hard to believe. So how about you choose between one of these, you post up and fight, or walk away like a G. Man every decision we make is way too hard, â€˜cause you know itâ€™ll always just get too far, so lets not risk it and just be calm, â€˜cause you know if we go at it youâ€™ll be more than gone. And I donâ€™t wanna put you out on the spot, but we both know that I carry the best OG glock. So I really suggest that you walk away, â€˜cause you know if we go at it youâ€™ll get messed up anyways.

Donâ€™t you think this is over â€˜cause Iâ€™m not done, it was always yâ€™all having all the fun. (Uh oh) But now itâ€™s my turn, so you better run, â€˜cause the words I got, arenâ€™t done, yes somebody flunked, lotta wording on my tongue gotta thank God for my lungs. Donâ€™t you worry though â€˜cause Iâ€™ll be done soon enough, when the devilâ€™s hung Iâ€™ll be done, meantime Iâ€™ma keep it up, otherwise Lucifer you better keep it shut.

How many times have you visited Church praying away the same sin? How many times have you turned on God because your patience was running to thin?
